briefTitle: MK0431 Monotherapy Study in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (0431-040)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients have Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus and have laboratory results that are within the values established by the study such as an Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) \>=7.5% and \<=11% and a Fasting Plasma Glucose (FPG) \>=130 mg/dL and \<=280 mg/dL

Exclusion Criteria :

* Patients have Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus or required insulin therapy within the past 12 months

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) at Week 18
outcomeMeasures.description: A1C was measured as a percent. Thus, this change from baseline reflects the Week 18 A1C percent minus the Week 0 A1C percent.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Fasting Plasma Glucose (FPG) at Week 18
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline at Week 18 is defined as Week 18 FPG minus Week 0 FPG.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in 2-hr Post-Meal Glucose (PMG) at Week 18
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline at Week 18 is defined as Week 18 minus Week 0.
